mapper.select: SELECT bootstrapServersConfig as jsonbtServersConfig ,autoCommitConfig ,groupIdConfig ,buffTopicName as jsonbTopicName ,buffMinBatchSize ,buffIsHashListInclude ,buffTimeoutMillis ,buffPollIntervalMillis FROM bufferStatus
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bufferStatus (bootstrapServersConfig, autoCommitConfig, groupIdConfig, buffTopicName, buffMinBatchSize, buffIsHashListInclude, buffTimeoutMillis, buffPollIntervalMillis) VALUES (#{jsonbtServersConfig}, #{autoCommitConfig}, #{groupIdConfig}, #{jsonbTopicName}, #{buffMinBatchSize}, #{buffIsHashListInclude}, #{buffTimeoutMillis}, #{buffPollIntervalMillis})
